Key Match Events: Fred VanVleet grabbed a key steal late to secure the victory for the Houston Rockets.
Amen Thompson added 23 points and a career-high 16 rebounds in his return after a two-game suspension.
A basket by LeBron James got the Lakers within 117-115 with eight seconds to go.
Alperen Sengun missed 1 of 2 free throws, giving Los Angeles a chance to tie the game.
Fred VanVleet stole the inbounds pass intended for LeBron James while James was signaling for a timeout.
VanVleet made 1 of 2 free throws to secure the victory.
Anthony Davis had 30 points and 13 rebounds for the Lakers.
LeBron James added 21 points, 13 rebounds, and nine assists.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James addressed the referees not acknowledging his call for a timeout after the game, stating, 'Max definitely still had the ball in his hands but it wasn't awarded. That happens. We didn't lose the game because of that.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets had 52 points in the paint compared to 40 by the Lakers.
